topic.title: Content Completion in Documents with Relax NG Schemas

body.p: Inside the documents that use a Relax NG schema, the Content Completion Assistant is able to present element values if such values are specified in the Relax NG schema. Also in Relax NG documents the Content Completion Assistant presents additional values of type ID for an anyURI data type.
